headline: Latest News In Electric Vehicles - XPENG Unveils AI-Powered Mobility Advancements at IAA Mobility 2025
summary: XPENG, a prominent player in the electric vehicle sector, recently showcased significant advancements at IAA Mobility 2025, highlighting its commitment to AI-driven mobility solutions. The company introduced the Next P7, an AI-enhanced vehicle, and announced plans to open its Munich R&D Center, marking its first in Europe to enhance local innovation ties. XPENG's initiatives include launching L4 autonomous driving vehicles and expanding its product offerings to include flying vehicles and...
